title: Leka Tu'ungafasi
text:
Leka Tu'ungafasi is a <a href="Tonga">Tonga</a>n <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for in the <a href="National%20Provincial%20Championship%20%282006%E2%80%93present%29">Bunnings NPC</a>. His position is <a href="Prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">prop</a>. He is the brother of <a href="Ofa%20Tu%27ungafasi">Ofa Tu'ungafasi</a>.
In June 2021 he signed for Northland.
